thread.title: Eat Vegan ‘Clam’ Chowder and ‘Lobster’ Rolls at By Chloe, Opening This Week
thread.title_full: Eat Vegan ‘Clam’ Chowder and ‘Lobster’ Rolls at By Chloe, Opening This Week

author: Rachel Leah Blumenthal
title: Eat Vegan ‘Clam’ Chowder and ‘Lobster’ Rolls at By Chloe, Opening This Week
text: Eat Vegan ‘Clam’ Chowder and ‘Lobster’ Rolls at By Chloe, Opening This Week Here’s the menu for By Chloe’s first Boston location, debuting on February 23 Pesto “meatball” sandwich at By Chloe Mikey Pozarik for By Chloe By Chloe (stylized as by CHLOE.) debuts in Boston’s Seaport District (107 Seaport Blvd.) this Thursday, as previously reported , serving up a completely vegan menu that includes burgers and sandwiches, dairy-free ice cream, soups and salads, juices and smoothies, beer and wine, and more — not to mention dog treats. Here’s a peek at the menu, which includes several Boston-exclusive items — again, all vegan — that play on a few of the city’s traditional dishes: clam chowder (cauliflower cream, shiitake mushroom, corn, potato, parsley), lobster roll (hearts of palm, celery, smoked paprika, dill), Boston cream whoopie pie (vanilla custard, chocolate ganache), and Boston cream pie Chill (ice cream with vanilla custard, chocolate twist, dark chocolate ganache). By Chloe Menu — Seaport District, Boston by Eater Boston on Scribd This is the largest location for the growing chain, reports Boston Magazine , and while its design is similar to its New York siblings, there’s a hint of Boston — abstract seaweed-patterned wallpaper in the bathroom hallway. (Likewise, the forthcoming Fenway location will have some baseball wallpaper when it opens this spring.) By Chloe will be open in the Seaport from 11 a.m. to 10 p.m. on weekdays and 10 a.m. to 10 p.m. on weekends, with brunch service from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. on weekends. Keep an eye out for the spring arrival of By Chloe in Fenway as well as in Providence, Rhode Island. Related
